meanings.sent1: The elephant was gigantic compared to the tiny mouse.
meanings.sent2: The gigantic mountain loomed in the distance, casting a shadow over the valley.
meanings.sent3: The gigantic cake at the party was so big that it took three people to carry it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as gigantic as the sun, lighting up the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The gigantic waves crashed against the shore, creating a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.sent1: The gigantic tree in the forest towered over all the other plants.
meanings.sent2: The storm caused a gigantic mess in the backyard, with debris scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The gigantic teddy bear at the carnival was bigger than the children trying to win it.
meanings.sent4: His appetite was so gigantic that he could finish a whole pizza by himself.
meanings.sent5: The gigantic building stretched towards the sky, reaching for the clouds above.
